Text:
According to Wikipedia...
The uncut ep. 4 will air on AXN Asia on 4/30.
Let's hope someone's on the ball here when that happens. :) Thanks for the uploads!
Why did they pulled the e04?

@Feelmaster: Bryan Fuller, the show's creator, asked NBC to pull the episode after the Boston Marathon bombings because it deals with a woman brainwashing kids and using them to kill people.  He was concerned that after Newtown and Boston, it might hit a little to close to home for people in the States.

Read this article.....interesting, to say the least

http://www.examiner.com/article/nbc-pulls-hannibal-episode-after-boston-marathon-bombing
